name: Landbell Aktiengesellschaft für Rückhol-Systeme
goal:
The Landbell Group is a service company for take-back and recycling of packaging, WEEE and waste batteries and runs 34 compliance schemes globally.
Landbell and its affiliated companies manage the environmental and chemical compliance of producers in different EU Member States.
This includes consulting of producers and software development.
euInitiatives:
Directive on waste (2008/98/EC)
Packaging and packaging Waste Directive
Directive on waste electrical and electronic equipment (2012/19/EU)
Directive on batteries and accumulators and waste batteries and accumulators (2006/66/EC)
Regulation (EC) No 1013/2006 on shipments of waste
Analysis of the Interface of Chemicals, Products and Waste Policy
Plastics Strategy / Single Use Plastics Directive
Eco-Design Directive (2009/125/EC) and its implementing measures
Circular Economy Action Plan
RoHs Directive
REACH
